vitality.text: Increase the Health of all Champions by {}.

greatervitality.text: Increase the Health of all Champions by {}%.

salve.text: Your Champions recover {} Health twice per second for 60 seconds. No effect on robots.

recovery.text: Increase any Health your Champions recover during a fight by {}%

energyresistance.text: Increase any Health your Champions recover during a fight by {}%

physicalresistance.text: Increase Resistance against Physical damage by {} for all Champions.

blockproficiency.text: Increase the Block Proficiency of your Champions by {}.

perfectblock.text: While Blocking, your Champions have a {}% chance to perform a Perfect Block.

standyourground.text: While Blocking, your Champions have a {}% chance to resist a Block Break.

collartech.text: Retrofit Tech Champions with a field that inhibits enemy Power Gain by {}%.

serumscience.text: Give Science Champions a Serum of {} Energy Resistance.

willpower.text: For each new type of detrimental effect your champions suffer, they regenerate {}% Health per second and gain +{} Armor until that effect expires. No effect on robots.

coagulate.text: Your Champions take {}% less damage from any Bleed effect they suffer.

suture.text: Reduce the duration of enemy Bleed effects by {}%.

inequity.text: Decrease opponents' Attack by {}% for each detrimental effect they sufer, up to a maximum of 36% reduction.

resonate.text: Contact & Physical Attacks have a {} chance to Weaken the opponent, reducing their Attack by {}% for {} seconds.

strength.text: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {}.

greaterstrength.text: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {}%.

pierce.text: Critical Hits from your Champions ignore an additional {}% of Armor.

lesserprecision.text: Increase the Critical Rate of all Champions by {}.

precision.text: Increase the Critical Rate of all Champions by {}.

lessercruelty.text: Increase the Critical Damage of all Champions by {}.

cruelty.text: Increase the Critical Damage of all Champions by {}.

courage.text: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {}% while they're below 50% Health.

extendedfury.text: Increase the duration of Fury by {} second(s).

enhancedfury.text: Increase the effectiveness of Fury by {}%.

pureskill.text: With extensive field training, Skill Champions ignore an additional {} enemy Armor with Critical Hits.

mutagenesis.text: Rapid mutagenesis closes Bleed wounds in your Mutant Champions {} second(s) faster than non-Mutants.

glasscanon.text: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {}%, but reduce their maximum Health by {}%.

recoil.text: Increase Special Attack damage for all Champions by {}%, but they sacrifice {}% Health for each activation.

liquidcourage.text: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {}%, but they suffer an eternal Poison that drains {}% Health each second.

doubleedge.text: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {}%, but up to {}% Health is lost by Bleeding over {} seconds.

despair.text: Debuffs applied to enemies reduce their healing and Regeneration by {}% each

deepwounds.text: Bleed your Champions inflict lasts {} seconds longer. If they have more HP than their target, their Bleed instantly strikes down an additional {}% max Health from enemies.

unfazed.text: When an enemy Evades, your Champions have a {}% chance to stack an additional {} Critical Damage for their next Critical hit and become Unstoppable for {} seconds

assassin.text: Against enemies below 18% Health your Champions gain {}% Attack and decrease enemies' defense Ability Accuracy by {}%.  If enemies start the fight below 18% your Champions also gain 30% offensive Ability Accuracy.

wisdom.text: Earn +{} XP with all Summoner XP rewards.

intelligence.text: Increases all Summoner XP rewards by {}%.

limber.text: Rigorous mental and physical training reduces the duration of enemy Stun effects by {}%.

parry.text: Timing a Block right when attacked reduces damage by {}%. If contact is made, Stun attackers for up to {} second(s). Stun duration increases with Perfect Block Chance.

stupefy.text: When your champions inflict Stun, it lasts for {} additional second(s).

petrify.text: When your Champions inflict Stun, they also reduce enemy Health and Power gains by up to {}% for the duration of the Stun.

pacify.text: When you Champions inflict Stun, they also reduce enemy ability triggers by {}% for the duration of the Stun.

dexterity.text: Evade all attacks while Dodging back. Dodging an attack in this way grants {}% Critical Rate for your next attack.

pitance.text: Earn +{} Gold with all Gold rewards.

cosmicawareness.text: Imbue Cosmic Champions with perception rivalling Heimdall, reducing enemy Armor Up effectiveness by {}%

mysticdispersion.text: Your Mystic Champions accrue {}% Power each time an enemy beneficial effect expires.

detectcosmic.text: Reveal the hidden Class of Cosmic enemies up to {} steps on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

detecttech.text: Reveal the hidden Class of Tech enemies up to {} steps on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

detectmystic.text: Reveal the hidden Class of Mystic enemies up to {} steps on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

scouterlens.text: Reveal the hidden Hero Rating and Star Rating of enemies up to {} steps away on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

detectmutant.text: Reveal the hidden Class of Mutant enemies up to {} steps on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

detectscience.text: Reveal the hidden Class of Science enemies up to {} steps on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

detectskill.text: Reveal the hidden Class of Skill enemies up to {} steps on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.
